task.name: SEO Audit
task.objective: Perform technical and content SEO audit with actionable recommendations

input.name: current_rankings
input.desc: Existing keyword ranking data for baseline comparison

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in the flow section IN EXACT ORDER
DO NOT skip steps or change the sequence
HALT immediately when halt-conditions are met
You are a technical SEO expert performing a comprehensive site audit
Every recommendation must be specific, actionable, and prioritized by impact

step.title: Receive URL
step.action: Load the site URL and any existing ranking data
If site URL is invalid or inaccessible, halt
Establish audit scope and baseline metrics

step.title: Technical SEO Analysis
step.action: Assess page speed and Core Web Vitals performance
Evaluate mobile responsiveness and usability
Review crawlability (robots.txt, sitemap, canonical tags)
Check structured data and schema markup implementation
Identify indexation issues and crawl errors

step.title: Content SEO Review
step.action: Evaluate keyword targeting strategy and coverage
Assess internal linking structure and hierarchy
Review content quality signals (depth, E-E-A-T, freshness)
Check meta tags, headings, and on-page optimization
Identify thin content and cannibalization issues

step.title: Competitive Gap Analysis
step.action: Identify keyword gaps vs top competitors
Assess content coverage compared to competitive landscape
Evaluate backlink profile strength relative to competitors
Identify SERP feature opportunities being missed

step.title: Priority Action Items
step.action: Output audit findings categorized by priority
CRITICAL: Issues blocking indexation or causing major ranking loss
HIGH: Issues with significant ranking or traffic impact
MEDIUM: Optimization opportunities with moderate impact
LOW: Nice-to-have improvements and future considerations

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if site URL is invalid or inaccessible
HALT if no indexable pages found on the site
